BANK HOLIDAY: 27 April 2022 – SEPA payments paused
Due to the upcoming Slovenian Bank Holiday on Wednesday, April 27, Bitstamp’s SEPA incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.

Due to the upcoming public holiday on Wednesday, 27 April 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for all SEPA payments will be paused.

SEPA deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – Thursday, 28 April 2022.

USD and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

For any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.
